general.story: My name is Myron Gorbovyi. I was born on 10-th of May, 1984. After finishing Dolyna lyceum, I studied in National Technical University of Oil and Gas and get automatization engineer degree. Since there and by this time I live and work in Dolyna. I am engineer of electronic equipment on gas processing plant. Married, have two kids.

education: National Technical University Of Oil & Gas (2001-2006)
